title: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description:
Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor. MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)

1. When updating the checked state of the table, it takes a long time (30 seconds in my case).

IMPORTANT NOTES:

+ A busy cursor should be shown while the update is in progress.
+ This issue occurs when exporting a zip file in a workspace with many projects.

Steps to Reproduce:

1. Open a workspace with many projects.
2. Export Zip.
3. Select all projects.
4. Choose some file types.
5. Press ok.
EB: A busy cursor should be displayed during the update of the checkbox state.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
